comment.author: 32962935@N00
comment._content:
@NancyLiu@USA : A bit offtopic but you can watch whales at Andenes in Norway. See whalesafari.no/a/?id=66&vn=738. I think they saw whales on 98% of the trips last summer. They even have a guarantee:
We will give you a new trip for free, if you are unfortunate and don’t see whales the first time.

comment.author: 24966555@N02
comment._content: Awesome.

comment.author: 22848403@N02
comment._content:
By watching a photo with whale and then thinking of whale watching...Off topic?

I have always received phone calls telling me won a prize of a free cruise trip that need to take off from Florida, but they do not cover the cost of flight from California to Florida...Off topic?

New York Empire State building need to pay US$70 and waiting in line 2-3 hours to take a ride of speedy elevator to the roof top for view watching......

20 years ago in Hong Kong I need to take speedy elevator to go into my office to work everyday......

What kind of people need to pay US$70 per person and waiting in line 2-3 hours for the speedy elevator ride and roof top view? Well, what a treat!

Thanks for the link of Norway, I do see the people over there with simple smile which reflecting their simple mind----Hopfully this "pretty smile with simple mind" opinion did not off topic.
